mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_order (title, content, link, types, project_id, maker_id, buyer_id, payment_id) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{link},#{types},#{project_id},#{maker_id},#{buyer_id},#{payment_id});
mapper.select: SELECT bp.id, p.title, p.content, p.link, p.types, p.username, p.img FROM project_order bp JOIN project p ON bp.project_id = p.id WHERE buyer_id = #{buyer_id};
SELECT title, content, link, types, buyer_id FROM project_order;
SELECT title, content, link, types, buyer_id FROM project_order WHERE id = #{id};
